statements: SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE shares < 50;
SELECT post_id, comments, engagement_rate FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE comments > 50;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE likes > 100 AND comments < 50;
SELECT post_id, shares, engagement_rate FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE shares BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE likes > 50 OR shares < 20 AND comments > 10 ORDER BY shares, likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares, engagement_rate FROM SocialMediaEngagementMetrics WHERE likes + comments + shares < 200 OR engagement_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY likes + comments DESC;
SELECT id, platform, post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics;
SELECT platform, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, engagement_rate FROM influencer_impact ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM influencer_impact WHERE impact_score > 50 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC, comments ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT platform, SUM(likes) as total_likes, SUM(comments) as total_comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT platform, post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE platform='Instagram' AND post_id LIKE '%ABC' ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT platform, post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE platform='Twitter' AND (likes > 50 OR comments > 10) ORDER BY platform, likes DESC, comments DESC;

SELECT influencer_id, brand_id, engagement_rate, impact_score, post_date FROM influencer_impact WHERE engagement_rate > 0.05 AND impact_score > 50 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, impact_score DESC, post_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Social_Media_Engagement_Metrics;
SELECT platform, likes, shares FROM Social_Media_Engagement_Metrics ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count > 10000;
SELECT brand_name, total_engagement FROM Brand_Awareness WHERE total_engagement >= 5000 ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT id, platform, post_date, likes, comments, shares FROM Social_Media_Engagement_Metrics WHERE platform = 'Instagram';
SELECT * FROM Brand_Awareness WHERE total_engagement > 1000;
SELECT brand_name, total_engagement FROM Brand_Awareness ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT name, followers_count FROM Influencers WHERE followers_count >= 50000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT platform, post_date, likes, comments, shares FROM Social_Media_Engagement_Metrics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT name, engagement_rate, brand_collaborations FROM Influencers ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, brand_collaborations ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics
SELECT post_id, post_date, likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC
SELECT influencer_name, followers, engagement_rate FROM influencer_metrics WHERE followers > 10000
SELECT * FROM brand_metrics WHERE total_engagement_count > 500
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, total_likes, total_comments FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY campaign_name
SELECT influencer_name, followers FROM influencer_metrics;
SELECT brand_name, total_engagement_count FROM brand_metrics WHERE total_engagement_count > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_metrics ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT brand_name, total_influencers_reached FROM brand_metrics WHERE total_influencers_reached < 500 ORDER BY total_influencers_reached ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_metrics WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT influencers.name, influencers.followers, engagements.engagement_type FROM influencers JOIN engagements ON influencers.influencer_id = engagements.influencer_id;
SELECT brand_name, industry FROM brands WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT brand_name, industry, analytics.analysis_date FROM brands JOIN analytics ON brands.brand_id = analytics.brand_id ORDER BY analytics.analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC, comments
SELECT * FROM influencers WHERE followers > 100000 AND engagement_rate > 5.0
SELECT brand_name, industry, location FROM brands WHERE location = 'New York' AND industry = 'Fashion'
SELECT influencers.name, engagements.engagement_type FROM influencers JOIN engagements ON influencers.influencer_id = engagements.influencer_id
SELECT brand_id, AVG(engagement_id) as avg_engagement_id FROM analytics GROUP BY brand_id HAVING AVG(engagement_id) > 100
